section.title: Installing Keystone
section.p: Keystone is a vital part of HP Helion OpenStack®, and as such it is installed automatically by the Helion OpenStack installer (just after MySQL and RabbitMQ). The recommended way of installing Keystone is to allow the default configuration used by the installer. Once your cloud is up and running, you can add features (like LDAP integration) via the Keystone reconfiguration process. Please refer to Reconfiguring Keystone for more information.

section.title: Default Settings
